xbel.title: Pyhoo!
xbel.desc: This is a collection of useful pointers to Python-related material of various sorts. It grew out of my personal bookmarks collection, and is now maintained in XBEL, the XML Bookmark Exchange Language, partly as an experiment, partly as a demo for xmlproc and partly as a service for the public and myself.

bookmark.title: Introduction pointers @ python.org
bookmark.desc: A set of pointers to Python introductions.

bookmark.title: Comparisons of Python and other languages
The Quick Python Book
bookmark.desc: An online draft of an upcoming Python tutorial book by Ken McDonald.

bookmark.title: Python: It's not just for laughs
bookmark.desc: An article in WebReview about Python.

bookmark.title: Python 1.5 Quick Reference
bookmark.desc: A very concise and useful reference of Python minutiae.

bookmark.title: Python Performance Tips
bookmark.desc: Some hints on which style and constructs to use to achieve the best Python performance.

bookmark.title: Sockets
bookmark.desc: A guide to socket programming with Python.

bookmark.title: Tkinter guides and documentation
bookmark.desc: An introduction to Tkinter, a class reference and the Tk manual pages, all linked to from the Pythonware library page.

bookmark.title: Topic Guides @ python.org
bookmark.desc: This is a collection of topic guides as a part of the Python language website. Among the topics are XML, databases, Tkinter and web programming.

bookmark.title: HOWTOs @ python.org
bookmark.desc: A collection of HOWTO guides, covering Medusa, Curses, Qt, regular expressions and XML, among other things.

bookmark.title: Emacs modes for Python
bookmark.desc: This site contains some useful elisp packages such as a Python mode, a debugger mode etc.

bookmark.title: PTUI
bookmark.desc: A Tkinter-based IDE by Zachary Roadhouse.

bookmark.title: CoolEdit
bookmark.desc: A text editor with Python scripting internally. XWindows-only.

bookmark.title: UltraEdit
bookmark.desc: A general text editor for Windows. Python syntax support can be downloaded separately.

bookmark.title: The Python Journal
bookmark.desc: A web journal devoted to Python.

bookmark.title: Python-Friendly ISPs
bookmark.desc: A list of web host providers that also provide Python access for CGI and suchlike.
